title: Safe champions need buffed
body:
Orianna's main problem - ball travel time and late game scaling issues
The ball should travel through her W faster
and her skills at rank 5 don't do enough damage

Zyra - the weird support caster that has no movement speed skill nor does she have a good defensive skill to fall back onto.
And when she does cast ult to run she dies but the ult eventually knocks players up lol
and full AP zyra tends to fall off also (requiring her to build liandries torment)

sooo a nice fix would be to add some %hp damage to targets snared and / or increasing her auto attack range

replies.body: Zyra needs no buffs. If you have a decent Zyra on your team, she'll do most damage in the game, even as a support. Have you ever played zyra?
